recipe.ingredients: - chicken breasts, boneless and skinless: 4 (about 6 ounces each) - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - lemon zest: 1 tablespoon - fresh lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - fresh garlic (minced): 2 cloves - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - fresh thyme (chopped): 1 tablespoon - fresh rosemary (chopped): 1 tablespoon - ground black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Marinate Chicken: In a small bowl, combine olive oil, lemon zest, lemon juice, minced garlic, oregano, thyme, rosemary, and black pepper. Place chicken breasts in a resealable plastic bag and pour the marinade over the chicken. Seal the bag and make sure the chicken is well-coated. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or up to 4 hours. 2. Grill Chicken: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Remove the chicken from the marinade, discarding any remaining marinade. Grill the chicken for about 6-7 minutes per side, or until the chicken is cooked through and has internal temperature of 165°F (74°C). 3. Rest and Serve: Let the chicken rest for a few minutes after grilling. Serve with a side of steamed vegetables or a fresh salad.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 3g, Dietary Fiber: 0.5g, Sodium: 90mg, Saturated Fat: 2g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 35g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 1g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1182 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken Breasts: 828 calories (207 calories per breast) Olive Oil: 239 calories per 2 tablespoons Lemon Zest: Negligible Lemon Juice: 12 calories per 3 tablespoons Garlic: 9 calories for 2 cloves Herbs Spices: Negligible - Serving People: 4
